description: Gets the properties of a batch inference job including name, Amazon Resource Name (ARN), status, input and output configurations, and the ARN of the solution version used to generate the recommendations.

parameters.name: batchInferenceJobArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the batch inference job to describe.

nested_items.name: batchInferenceJob
nested_items.description: Information on the specified batch inference job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of the batch inference job.

nested_items.name: batchInferenceJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the batch inference job.

nested_items.name: filterArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the filter used on the batch inference job.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If the batch inference job failed, the reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: solutionVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the solution version from which the batch inference job was created.

nested_items.name: numResults
nested_items.description: The number of recommendations generated by the batch inference job. This number includes the error messages generated for failed input records.

nested_items.name: s3DataSource
nested_items.description: The URI of the Amazon S3 location that contains your input data. The Amazon S3 bucket must be in the same region as the API endpoint you are calling.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The file path of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon Personalize uses to encrypt or decrypt the input and output files.

nested_items.name: jobOutput
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that contains the output data generated by the batch inference job.

nested_items.name: s3DataDestination
nested_items.description: Information on the Amazon S3 bucket in which the batch inference job's output is stored.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The file path of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon Personalize uses to encrypt or decrypt the input and output files.

nested_items.name: batchInferenceJobConfig
nested_items.description: A string to string map of the configuration details of a batch inference job.

nested_items.name: itemExplorationConfig
nested_items.description: A string to string map specifying the exploration configuration hyperparameters, including explorationWeight and explorationItemAgeCutOff, you want to use to configure the amount of item exploration Amazon Personalize uses when recommending items. See User-Personalization.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that requested the batch inference job.

nested_items.name: batchInferenceJobMode
nested_items.description: The job's mode.

nested_items.name: themeGenerationConfig
nested_items.description: The job's theme generation settings.

nested_items.name: fieldsForThemeGeneration
nested_items.description: Fields used to generate descriptive themes for a batch inference job.

nested_items.name: itemName
nested_items.description: The name of the Items dataset column that stores the name of each item in the dataset.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the batch inference job. The status is one of the following values:
PENDING.
IN PROGRESS.
ACTIVE.
CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the batch inference job was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the batch inference job was last updated.
